channel.title: FeedForAll Sample Feed
channel.description: RSS is a fascinating technology. The uses for RSS are expanding daily. Take a closer look at how various industries are using the benefits of RSS in their businesses.

item.title: RSS Solutions for Restaurants
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Restaurant's communicate with customers. Let your customers know the latest specials or events.

RSS feed uses include:
Daily Specials
Entertainment
Calendar of Events

item.title: RSS Solutions for Schools and Colleges
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Educational Institutions communicate with students about school wide activities, events, and schedules.

RSS feed uses include:
Homework Assignments
School Cancellations
Calendar of Events
Sports Scores
Clubs/Organization Meetings
Lunches Menus

item.title: RSS Solutions for Computer Service Companies
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Computer Service Companies communicate with clients about cyber security and related issues.

Uses include:
Cyber Security Alerts
Specials
Job Postings

item.title: RSS Solutions for Governments
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Governments communicate with the general public about positions on various issues, and keep the community aware of changes in important legislative issues.

RSS uses Include:
Legislative Calendar
Votes
Bulletins

item.title: RSS Solutions for Politicians
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Politicians communicate with the general public about positions on various issues, and keep the community notified of their schedule.

Uses Include:
Blogs
Speaking Engagements
Statements

item.title: RSS Solutions for Meteorologists
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Meteorologists communicate with the general public about storm warnings and weather alerts, in specific regions. Using RSS meteorologists are able to quickly disseminate urgent and life threatening weather warnings.

Uses Include:
Weather Alerts
Plotting Storms
School Cancellations

item.title: RSS Solutions for Realtors & Real Estate Firms
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Realtors and Real Estate companies communicate with clients informing them of newly available properties, and open house announcements. RSS helps to reach a targeted audience and spread the word in an inexpensive, professional manner.

Feeds can be used for:
Open House Dates
New Properties For Sale
Mortgage Rates

item.title: RSS Solutions for Banks / Mortgage Companies
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Banks, Credit Unions and Mortgage companies communicate with the general public about rate changes in a prompt and professional manner.

Uses include:
Mortgage Rates
Foreign Exchange Rates
Bank Rates
Specials

item.title: RSS Solutions for Law Enforcement
item.description:
FeedForAll helps Law Enforcement Professionals communicate with the general public and other agencies in a prompt and efficient manner. Using RSS police are able to quickly disseminate urgent and life threatening information.

Uses include:
Amber Alerts
Sex Offender Community Notification
Weather Alerts
Scheduling
Security Alerts
Police Report
Meetings
